mapper.sql: SELECT od.ORDER_NUM, od.MEMBER_NUM, od.SHOWBOARD_NUM, od.NAME, od.SEX, od.COMPANY, od.ADDRESS, od.EMAIL, od.BARCODE, od.ORDER_DATE, od.TEL, od.ORDER_STATUS, od.BANK_ACCOUNT, od.TOTAL_PRICE, od.PAYMENT_TYPE, od.PAYMENT_DATE, od.PAYMENT_PAYER, sb.SUBJECT, sb.PRICE, sb.SHOW_STATUS, sb.FILE_SAVNAME, sb.START_DATE, sb.END_DATE, sb.ADDRESS2, sb.READCOUNT, sb.ORDERCOUNT FROM "ORDER" od join SHOWBOARD sb on od.SHOWBOARD_NUM=sb.SHOWBOARD_NUM
mapper.select: and od.MEMBER_NUM=#{member_num} order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC
and od.ORDER_DATE=#{order_date} order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC
and od.EMAIL like #{email} and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC

and od.SUBJECT like #{show_subject} and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC

and od.ORDER_STATUS like #{order_status} and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC
and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER" (ORDER_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, SHOWBOARD_NUM, NAME, SEX, COMPANY, ADDRESS, EMAIL, BARCODE, ORDER_DATE, TEL, ORDER_STATUS, BANK_ACCOUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAYMENT_DATE, PAYMENT_PAYER) VALUES (ORDER_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_num}, #{showboard_num}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{company}, #{address}, #{email}, #{barcode}, #{order_date}, #{tel}, #{order_status}, #{bank_account}, #{total_price}, #{payment_type}, {payment_date}, #{payment_payer})
